sentence: Accessible Keys for Video[Space Bar] toggles play/pause;[Right/Left Arrows] seeks the video forwards and back (5 sec );[Up/Down Arrows] increase/decrease volume;[M] toggles mute on/off;[F] toggles fullscreen on/off (Except IE 11);The [Tab] key may be used in combination with the [Enter/Return] key to navigate and activate control buttons, such as caption on/off.Good morning.
reason: This sentence is irrelevant to US monetary policy as it pertains to the accessibility features of a video. It does not provide any information or implications regarding the stance of the Federal Open Market Committee (FOMC) or its monetary policy decisions.

sentence: For these brief remarks, I was asked to share my thoughts on the Community Reinvestment Act (CRA), a topic of great interest to all of you and to me as well.As you are well aware, the Federal Reserve is working in partnership with the Office of the Comptroller of the Currency (OCC) and the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC) to release a final rule for the CRA.
reason: This sentence is irrelevant to US monetary policy as it does not provide any indication or implication regarding the stance of the Federal Reserve on interest rates or other monetary policy tools. It primarily discusses the Community Reinvestment Act (CRA) and the collaboration between the Federal Reserve, OCC, and FDIC in releasing a final rule for it.

sentence: The CRA is one of the seminal laws enacted to address systemic inequities in access to credit and one of the best tools that we, as regulators, have to help ensure banks meet their affirmative obligation to serve the credit needs of the communities in which they do business, including low- and moderate-income communities.CRA has been an area of focus for me for over 25 years.
reason: This sentence is irrelevant to US monetary policy as it primarily discusses the Community Reinvestment Act (CRA) and its importance in addressing systemic inequities in access to credit. It does not provide any indication of a hawkish, dovish, or neutral stance on monetary policy.

sentence: As many of you know, I have had the opportunity to research and write about the CRA and its impact long before joining the Federal Reserve Board.
reason: This sentence is irrelevant to US monetary policy as it discusses the personal experience and background of the speaker, without providing any indication of their stance on interest rates or the economy.

sentence: Extensive stakeholder engagement and policy deliberations directly informed our proposal last year.

sentence: What I will lay out as priorities for CRA reform align with the priorities you have heard previously from the Federal Reserve, OCC, and FDIC.First, a successful reform of CRA must advance the core purpose of the statute.
reason: This sentence is irrelevant to US monetary policy as it does not provide any indication of the stance or direction of monetary policy. It discusses priorities for CRA reform, which is unrelated to the monetary policy stance being hawkish, dovish, or neutral.

sentence: The law was intended to address inequities in access to credit and promote community engagement and financial inclusion in low- and moderate-income communities.Second, the new CRA rule should address the significant changes in the banking sector since the regulations were last substantially revised more than a quarter century ago.

sentence: This involves evaluation of online and mobile banking, branchless banking, and hybrid models.Third, the new CRA rule should provide greater clarity, consistency, and transparency so that everyoneâthe public, community groups, and banksâunderstands what counts for CRA consideration and how a bank's rating is determined.

sentence: As you saw in the proposal, the agencies are working to develop a metrics-based approach to CRA evaluations for retail lending and community development financing to bring greater clarity and consistency to CRA examinations, while still ensuring that there is an opportunity to consider qualitative factors to encourage activities that are particularly impactful or responsive.And fourth, the new CRA rule should align evaluations and data collection to bank size and type.

sentence: One of the strengths of the banking sector is its diversity of institutions, so a modern CRA must accommodate banks of different sizes and business models and ensure that smaller banks do not have the same requirements as large banks with much greater capacity.I know that many of you are eagerly awaiting the new CRA rule.
